xml.name: Better names for error variables
xml.Text: GoLand now suggests you the most popular name variants for error (err) and context (ctx) variables.
xml.Try: See that the caret is at the greet call. Press IntroduceVariable to extract a variable.
Choose the whole call in the list and press EditorEnter. Notice that GoLand suggested the err name for the variable as it is the most common name for the error.
